judyle.comment:
I appreciate the thorough discussion around student safety and principal confidence, but I still feel uncertain about how effectively the updated code of conduct will reduce reliance on SROs. Given the lack of clarity on implementation and training, I'm not confident in its ability to achieve those goals.

I'll abstain so we can continue gathering input from principals and staff before moving forward.

jonnoalcaro.comment: I've listened carefully to everyone's comments, especially Judi's, and I'm not going to oppose her motion.  So my vote is yes.

katrinacallsen.comment: I'm not sure if I've seen all the changes that were made. So while I generally agree with the direction we're going, I want to make sure I fully understand everything that's being proposed. I can't commit to a vote until I've had an opportunity to review it more closely.
